title: School Flower and School Tyrant - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life
tags: Academy   Cross-dressing   Cute Protagonist   Debts   Family Business   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Rivalry   Secret Identity   Trap   Wealthy Characters
author: 赋格
description: 'You will be mine sooner or later.' At this time, Bai Yuxuan, the School Tyrant said to Ouyang Qianxue, the School Flower with her back against the wall. 'Uh, that...actually I am a man...' 'That's great. Now, because I’m a girl' '...' So the easy love comedy of fake school girl  and tomboy  began.>
